headline: Northrop Grumman : and Marshall Land Systems Collaborate for Cutting-Edge Command and Control Systems
summary: HUNTSVILLE, Ala. - June 5, 2025 - Northrop Grumman Corporation and Marshall Land Systems signed a Memorandum of Understanding to advance command and control hardware solutions for the United Kingdom...
